Today is #VFWDay and I salute the @VFWHQ and the brave Rhode Islanders who have sacrificed so much for our nation and serve our veterans each and every day.

Today, we remember the hundreds of people who were injured & the 58 lives that were taken in the #LasVegas mass-shooting massacre. On behalf of victims & survivors alike we must continue working to reduce #gunviolence & stop gun-trafficking.

Deeply saddened by the mass-shooting in South Carolina. Our hearts go out to the police officers & their families. We are so grateful to law enforcement officials nationwide who put their lives on the line to protect our communities.

I just voted against moving #Kavanaugh nomination forward. Americans deserve to have highly-qualified, fair, impartial jurists serving on the Supreme Court. Kavanaugh proved beyond reasonable doubt that he doesn‚Äôt have temperament to serve on #SCOTUS.

Pleased to secure federal funds to upgrade roads & infrastructure at @QuonsetRI. Today, joined w/ #Quonset officials & community partners to break ground on a new $100 million meat packaging facility set to open in 2020 & expected to bring over 700 jobs to RI. https://t.co/Q5XXmqqOho

Social Security is not an entitlement, it‚Äôs a covenant: Americans who pay into the system deserve to get their money when they retire. It‚Äôs the difference between people living with dignity instead of in poverty. We must strengthen & #SaveSocialSecurity.

I strongly oppose repealing the #AffordableCareAct & rolling back protections for people with #preexistingconditions. Millions of hardworking Americans will suffer if Republicans gut the ACA. #ProtectOurCare

We must uphold the #ACA & preserve protections for people with #preexistingconditions. Getting set to join @SenWhitehouse for #healthcare discussion at @CCAPORG. Watch live at 11 am: https://t.co/wfznSNflzf

Khashoggi development is an admission of guilt, but Saudis still aren‚Äôt coming clean w/ the truth.  This appears to have been a deliberate, planned act followed by a cover up. You don‚Äôt bring 15 men and a bone saw to a fist fight with a 60 year old. Fist fight? Where is the body?

Saudi‚Äôs latest version of events isn‚Äôt credible. Trump Admin must not be complicit in allowing them to sweep this under the rug. We must demand independent investigation & honest account of what transpired. Follow evidence wherever it leads & bring justice to those responsible.

Grateful to law enforcement officials for working together to protect the public & postal workers by tracking down suspect in mail bomb case. This was not a hoax & those who labeled it as such did a disservice. Now we must follow facts & evidence & bring perpetrator to justice.

Praying for the victims of the Tree of Life Synagogue in Pittsburgh & for our nation to summon the moral courage to stop hate-filled mass shootings. We stand with the Jewish community. Good people of all faiths must do more to combat anti-Semitism & religious intolerance.

Yesterday, a vast majority of Americans voted for more accountability & fair oversight of the Trump Administration, not less. If Pres Trump thinks firing AG #Sessions now will prevent him from being held accountable, he is mistaken. My statement: https://t.co/avplH0iMmx

Our hearts are w/ #ThousandOaks. We owe it to innocent victims of horrific #BorderLineShooting & the 30,000+ Americans who are killed by #gunviolence each year to enact stronger #gunsafety laws. We need Pres Trump & GOP to come to table & help enact solutions to #EndGunViolence.

This Sunday marks 100 years since the #Armistice was signed in November 1918, bringing an end to #WorldWarI. Time will not forget those who sacrificed everything in service to our country & we must not forget the horror & heartbreak of war. #Armistice100 https://t.co/3df6PTgluc

74 years ago, Benjamin Carbone earned several medals for his distinguished service as a ball turret gunner aboard a B-24 Liberator aircraft during #WorldWarII. Today, we honor him. Tune in at 3 pm for a special medal ceremony: https://t.co/Wfdwp6mtSv #GreatestGeneration

Every RIer who answered the call to serve in #WorldWarII & fulfilled their duty w/ honor & distinction, as Benny Carbone did, is a hero in my book. Pres Trump‚Äôs failure to pay his respects to U.S. troops killed in #WWI is disgraceful. Our troops made the ultimate sacrifice on the field of battle, meanwhile Trump wouldn‚Äôt even sacrifice a few minutes in light rain to join other world leaders. Lack of respect & leadership.

Today, Pres Trump chose to stay at his hotel rather than join other world leaders in paying respects to fallen servicemen who gave their last full measure fighting on behalf of our grateful nation. Learn more about brave Americans buried at #AisneMarne: https://t.co/CFWudrggN9

Today is a day of solemn remembrance.
100 years after the #armistice, we honor those who fought so bravely in #WWI & all #veterans.
Let us endeavor to be worthy of their sacrifice; Rise to match their courage; & Build a more peaceful, free, & just future they fought for.
